description: Its a great Fr/DH trail. It's got some insane rides, teeter-totters, and some drops.Bike shop / rentals: Freedom Bike Shop Accomodations: Summerland Resort
directions: Take Carmi Ave. Up pased the Lost Moose Lodge and take the logging road on your right(the second one!!) and follow it until you come to a parking area and follow the trail until you get to a rock ledge and there you are.
title: Code 4
